name: Colossal
description:
Colossal is a multiplayer, battle royale game. Play as a creature where you hunt, forage and evolve to battle other players for supremacy! The game is 2-6 players and is played on local multiplayer.

Developers:
Made by the Cosmicow team.

Artists:
Adam Long: Lead Environment Artist, Creature Artist,  FX artist, Game Designer
Matthew Atkinson: Lead Creature Artist, Animator, UI Artist, Game Designer

Programmers:
Amber Julian: AI programmer,  Shader Designer/Programmer, Game Designer
Anuj Dyamanna: AI Programmer, UI Programmer, Game Designer
Benn Abbot: Network Engineer, Architecture Developer, Game Designer

Feedback is welcome.... 

Enjoy!
